resources.string: Come up with your nickname. It will be displayed in the leaderboard
First come up with your nickname. It will be displayed in the leaderboard
Important! If you delete the app or delete its data, the nickname will not be returned.
The nickname must contain from 4 to 15 characters.
Nickname is already taken, think of something else.
A nickname can only contain numbers and letters
There should be no more than one space.

string.name: no_winner_text
string.u: There is no winner yet, be the first

resources.string: There is a winner, but he did not write his name
The link to the winner is copied
Read the rules before you start

The rules are very simple. The first to solve 21 puzzles will receive a prize. Each puzzle is given 3 attempts. If they run out you can get one more if you watch the ads. The longer there is no winner, the bigger the prize.
Good news! There is a new season, rather update:) (The previous season is now inactive)
Terribly sorry, but you need to update😐
watch the ads to get a try
An error occurred while connecting to the server
The ad is not ready yet
If you answer correctly, you will need an Internet connection
In the following puzzles the answers will be checked remotely via the Internet, therefore there may be small delays
Thank you so much for the game, I really hope you enjoyed it😏\n I would be very pleased if you leave a review.

That in the middle is on the left. That to the right is to the right. That in the middle is in the middle. That to the right is to the left. That is left is right.
